Judul: TEMPERATURE COMPENSATION OF A TRANSISTORIZED PULSE SEQUENCE GENERATOR
Abstrak: A circuit for a transistorized pulse sequence generator was set up on a breadboard in the laboratory. To observe the effect of the temperature, the breadboard was put in the oven and heated from 82Â°F to 206Â°F, The output pulse was observed with a dual-trace oscilloscope; the width of the pulse was found to decrease when the temperature increased. This effect was compensated with a Western Electric thermistor (nonlinear compensation).
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing 1: Nathan B. Allison, Pembimbing 2: Peter J. Graham
